lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, and good evening, everyone! Welcome to Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors play Dungeons & Dragons! Or yell curse words at me as we intro. So yes! Welcome to the show tonight! Sam Riegel is on his way, our Scanlan will be here shortly. Such is the nature of these things. But, anyway, welcome to our show, friends new and old. Tonight, we're continuing a rather intense beginning of the next arc of Critical Role, as Laura prepares her dice via bulk-rolling. I like the juju aspect of it. It's nice. It gets the energy going. Just burn all those twenties out first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I've already rolled two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See? There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those are two you cannot use.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It won't be all of us, some folks have a really early morning tomorrow and unfortunately have to run off due to needing to exist tomorrow professionally, but we will be doing that this evening. Let's see, as far as announcements go--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're winging it today. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, except for Liam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: February 19th to the 21st. Come say hi! Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so hard to get all of us in one place at the same time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you're even in a neighboring state, come see us, because we might not make it all that way again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And bring your dice, and we'll all roll together!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll bless them. Or he will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll bless them, Laura will curse them, it'll be great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, me and Marisha will be at Colorado Anime Fest, the weekend before that-- actually next weekend.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Valentine's-- next weekend!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next weekend! We'll be in Denver for that convention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come spend Valentine's Day with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I will be at Amazing Arizona Comic Con that weekend. The Amazing Arizona Comic Con, Saturday and Sunday.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam's here-- can someone let Sam in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a gnome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let Sam in!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) I got him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see, other announcements. Oh, the next episode of the GM/DM Tips goes up tomorrow on the Geek & Sundry website. Check that out. Not sure what topic it is. I don't know what order they're putting them out on, so it'll be a surprise for both of us! But hopefully you guys will find it helpful. I hope the previous ones have as well. If these turn out well, and people like them, and go click on them and share them around, they'll be more apt to do more, in which case I can do more in-depth, advanced videos. So, let's hope that works out well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if you're not a DM, you should go look at them. So you can keep making more!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (Last of Us clicker noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's a whole different clicker. And then, first weekend of March, me and Marisha will be in Cork, in Ireland, for Kaizoku Con. So, that'll be a lot of fun, you guys can come out there. And yes, I know that Ireland is not in the UK, that was meant to be a joke, but the internet did not take it as such, and felt the need to correct me for a week. And you know what, I deserve that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are no jokes here!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's crazy, the internet has the best sense of humor about everything!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The internet always understands sarcasm!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as a person of some Irish lineage, I may have accidentally also offended my ancestors, so I apologize to everyone!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have a gnome!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey scarf man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got to go get ice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go get ice? He'll be back!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he cosplaying as Matthew Mercer? What's going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks to the Critter who sent us bacon jerky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis will be smelling like bacon jerky for the rest of his life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Prepare yourself! That smells extra like dog farts!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! It really does!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just have a piece! One little piece!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure it's delicious!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give you the ear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aww, that's-- whoever sent those, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was amazing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very aerodynamic jerky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see, other announcements. Liam, do you want to mention that one thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll do our weekly shout-out to Wyrmwood gaming. If you go over to Wyrmwood Gaming and put in the code "CRITROLE", you'll get free shipping, and also, over at Wyrmwood Gaming, they're doing a Valentine's Day Lottery, where you're getting a mystery box for a lower rate? I dunno, look at the rules, I don't want to mess it up. But your dork dollars will go farther if you go over there this week. Happy Valentine's Day!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dork dollars, that's like bitcoin, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, kind of! Let's see, other things-- for those who didn't see it, Lootcrate put up a cool video about their most recent package that's going out this month, themed "Dead," in which they shot a ten-minute short film in the zombie apocalypse, starring me!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So sad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't save her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look! You think I can save anyone in the apocalypse?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would hope so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, it's impressive that you were the one that lived.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you straight-up run, or would you throw people in front of you so that they would be trampled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Neither! I'd try and work things out, and then get sniped in the head. We've had this conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, are you kidding me? He'd be the first one that would be like, "Oh, rivalling--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Let's save everyone!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Phone's ringing, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. You need to get that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, I'll send it to voicemail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All righty, anything else anyone needs to mention? Or announce?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bacon jerky's fucking good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It actually is really good. Yeah, once you've tasted it, you don't smell the stank.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like garlic. As long as everybody's had the garlic, everything's cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You wanna try it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I can smell it on you now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? It's disgusting!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want some? You want to join the fold?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is adding to, like, the tavern-ish feel of this place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty! Announcements are over-- let's go ahead and get into the game proper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The party fled to their keep, attempted to help a bunch of refugees inside and then were immediately attacked by Vorugal, the white dragon. A heavy battle commenced that was ill in favor of your victory until Thordak himself knocked Vorugal out of the sky, claiming that there were better things to be done. So three of the four of this Chroma Conclave have now gone east, while Thordak sits in the middle of his new nesting place. You guys decided to try and help those who were in the keep at the time, those who survived that encounter on the outside of Greyskull. However, Percy and Grog had a conversation about this magical skull artifact they had acquired: this whispering in exchange for a wish if it got freed. This led to a rather intense bit of conflict--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Negotiation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. (laughs) Which, thanks to the luck of the die, seemed to avoid a unique circumstance, whatever that might have been.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) However, the party in this tense scenario were then visited by a dwarven elementalist named Drake, along with your old-time friend and guide Allura Vysoren, who had sensed the connection to her teleportation circles here in Emon severed immediately. There was discussion about how this came about, who's to blame, and it appears that this dragon has a history, 15 years before, of having conflict with Allura and her then-party of adventurers, many of whom lost their life in the final battle. When they realized they were unable to actually defeat Thordak, hatched a plan to seal him within the elemental plane of fire, and had managed to keep him there for 15 years until recently. We left off with Allura suddenly sensing her connection to the Westruun sigil severed as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God, I forgot about that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing like genocide to put you in the mood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! That is where we'll pick up. So, at this point, after Allura senses this, her eyes go wide for a moment and she-- you, being there in front of her still, Keyleth, after your guys' scrying ritual, grabs your shoulder, and looks around the room. "Who is left? Where is the "council? Which allies can we draw to us, in hopes of planning our next move?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are scattered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For all we know, the council is lost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could be all that's left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) "Well, we have to try and gather what information we can about who remains. If "anyone out there survives, any of our allies, we need to make sure that they're brought away from "the center of this chaos. And hopefully we can reconvene and figure out a path of hoping to free "our city, our entire land, of this scourge."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we even make contact with them? Thordak is in the center of town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps skirting the center and hoping others have found their way towards the outskirts "of it. I don't know. This is as far as I've gotten to the city, is your guys' keep. You have the "better position on this. Where would anyone in the town go? Are there places to hide, are there--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that they would leave the center of the city, at least to the edges, if not try to get out, though that might be foolish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check the harbor, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know that Riskel made secret passageways in different places.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Security tunnels!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Did we ever find out if he put one in ours? Did we have one? That leads into the town?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, didn't we have a tunnel made that goes under the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But does it lead out into the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't actually utilized it yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've never used it, but they described it to us when they brought us here the first day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can sneak in!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to see if Uriel is still alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, hi guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, how's it going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, who was with Gilmore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore disappeared. I didn't see where he went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was alone before it all happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's another place to check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, where? Gilmore's?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm thinking of where I would go if I didn't know what to do--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's smart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What places are left that have a teleportation circle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the thieves' guild tunnels? Would anyone go there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It depends on who knows! It's a way out of the city once again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The smuggler's coves, all of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not a bad idea, either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was all through the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That bar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through the bar, in the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Place. With the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The connections I had to this town were within my tower, your keep, and the Lyceum, the "Alabaster Lyceum. The Lyceum has also been severed, and though I know not of what may remain "there, that is also a place of great power, hence why it was probably a very operative target for "their attack."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far does your arcane connection reach? Can you feel when you lose connection to other cities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I have a connection to the sigil, yes. I don't have much beyond the boundaries of "Tal'Dorei. Vasselheim does not allow sigils for transportation, it's against their philosophy "against embedded arcane intrusion. If Westruun is under attack as well, I will make my way there in "hopes of salvaging any lives that I can."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're leaving?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If Westruun is under attack, now, and we know Thordak is here, does that mean--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His forces are divided.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a takeover. For some reason Thordak doesn't want to leave this city. Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the seat of power, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could potentially attack one of his subordinates, though. One of the other dragons in Westruun, by themselves!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then he could just come and kill us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then we teleport right back out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bad idea? Bad idea?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How fast is he?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they just made it to Westruun, several hundred miles away, in all of 40 minutes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot of assumptions here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They move rather fast, and to be honest, I hate to inform you, but my single teleportation "ability has been utilized for the day in getting here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm tapped out, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lady Allura, what do you know of Marquet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Marquet."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said that they successfully repulsed him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "400 years ago, yes, when he was younger. He was a much smaller dragon then."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 400 years ago?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he is ancient, Grog! He is ancient!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, slightly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The only thing I can think of: there are two bastions of knowledge that hold inklings as to "what could be the undoing of dragonkind, of powerful entities. There were battles of many such "powerful entities, long, long ago, back before the Penance, before the historical wiping of "civilization. Some of these books remain in Vasselheim, being the only city to have survived "those times. A few have found their way in the Cobalt Reserve, the library of Westruun. If I "could go and hope that this library still stands, stay out of sight, help who I can along the way, "and gather what bits of research I can and bring them back here, perhaps we could reconvene as long "as you go and find who you can of our allies that survive within Emon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can do that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Within Emon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going to let you go on your own?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, she has Drake with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which Drake next to her says, "Damn right, she does! And I don't mean any offence, but the "two of us is about the same as you lot!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Say what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Trust me," and he gives you this dwarven grin as both of his eyes spark for a second with electricity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Well, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of you excel at that, maybe not all. And "speed. I believe we can handle this. You're better suited in combing large bits of territory and "seeking the allies that may survive."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you be leaving in the morning, then? Can you go tonight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I should leave now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to go on foot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have other means of transportation."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, if you're going to Westruun, and what you say is true, that we have two potential options for finding out how to defeat these dragons, should we be heading to Vasselheim? Maybe that's best where we're needed right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Especially the center of an entity such as "Bahamut, who stands against such creatures. I think Vasselheim is going to definitely claim a "key role in this attempt to save ourselves."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bahamut is a good guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, for the most-- yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the city that was closest to Pyrah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My people, my tribe. We could pull double duty, we could go and I can--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heh. Doody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog! Now is not the time!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What of Whitestone? Was there any mention, any--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no connection to Whitestone. I did not have time arriving there to install a sigil."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you learn anything of the anomaly beneath the castle that might be useful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She shakes herself in her current mindset and goes, "Well, me and Drake here, we spent the "better part of two days studying the structure underneath the city. It itself appears to be at "least 600 years old, predating Whitestone's construction. Unfortunately, both of our magics "are thwarted in the proximity of this structure and any rituals that we attempted, or would have "been able to attempt, to discern its nature, in the classic means, would not be functional due to "its anti-magical properties. However, we've taken a few things of note, and we're taking our "observations to reach for two research facilities around the world, one of which I intended to be "the Cobalt Reserve before this happened."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So there was no-- you didn't move it, you didn't do anything with it, it's still just sitting there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a hazard zone right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Essentially. We have locked it off and it's under intense guard. We spent a little bit of "time experimenting with its properties, and any object of firm matter that was introduced to this "object was then torn from our grasp, sundered into many pieces, and then vanished."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can get Thordak near the little orb!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah! Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was definitely what I was thinking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's part of a plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, big dragon, there's a snack over here. Take a bite!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could leave a trail of gold that leads to it, Goldilocks-style.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That thing was also several hundred feet below ground. How are we going to get that dragon down there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does Thordak have any offspring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not that I know of."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The thought would be to actually remove it from the chamber, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That could be really, really terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do dragons have families? Do they have, like, wives and loved ones?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: MATT "Chromatics especially, from what I understand in my research, they do mate, but there "is no family structure, there is no love between brethren, other than the continued existence of "that bloodline. If a child of a dragon is slaughtered and one does find out, depending on if "it's their only brethren, it could incite a sense of vengeance, depending on the color. But I know "of no immediate children to Thordak. I have no knowledge of the other dragons which have attacked "this day."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should ask him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: MATT "I have not seen Thordak myself in 15 years, and I know not the state of which he is in, or "what power he has now gained. Whatever information you can gather safely, right now, is going to "guide us down the rest of this path in attempting to take this terrible creature down."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go back into the city to try to find council members, and we succeed, what does that get us? A bunch of people who also don't know how to defeat the dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, but they're powerful people! They could help us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Politically?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Both, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Experience and warrior-wise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about a spy? Dragons want servitude, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which is, based on what you're telling me, is part of what Thordak is attempting with this city now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, what if we send a shady piece of shit to go bend the knee and walk on the inside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Listen, Jarett is good, but I don't want to sacrifice him like that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about you, Scanlan? You're so good at lying, and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Being shady!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And sucking up, and grovelling--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket can't talk!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not a bad idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I do have this-- pulling the brooch off-- this would mask your true nature, somewhat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's true! (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stuttering) I am not going to go--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ancient, giant, red, fuck-off dragon!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have mind control powers! They have influence! They have charisma! Beyond even mine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll be his bitch! You'll trim his toenails, you'll get real buddy-buddy--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the size of his toenails!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Slave Leia outfit, with a chain around your neck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he's the little guy next to Jabba! (cackling laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You might be surprised. You might like it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean like what, dragons have to eat right? Dragons eat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dragons eat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! So you poison a cow, and then you're like, Oh Lord Thioredoxin, here you go! Poison cow, you're dead, hero of the city!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something tells me I would end up his gimp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stuttering) You Dimension Door! You're super quick! It's a no brainer!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, that's the best plan ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just think about it, all right, Scanlan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to find Uriel. We need to go in-- all these are the next step-- we need to see-- we have sacrificed a lot to save Uriel before, we're not just going to leave him in the city! We need to find the tunnel under this keep, go in there, see who's left, and get them out!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, speaking of spies, does anyone else feel like this is fairly convenient timing? Someone in that council had to have known this was happening. Wouldn't you? All of the Cloudtop District was in one place!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not a bad point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone knew! It was the perfect opportunity to strike! They took out the entire upper echelon of the city in one strike! They waited for them all to be in one place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: General Krieg was here for a while, before we discovered him. He had friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But he wouldn't have known this was coming, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but he was one of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's possible they might not have been working in conjunction with each other. They could have been on their own, all of them, or all together, I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does open the door to some definite possibilities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The timing was perfect. That's all I'm saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The timing was perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll do it, I'll go and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we go and find a shady individual, like he was saying. What if we don't send in Scanlan. What if we find someone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're probably right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will surely die. Which I'm all right with.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go find this tunnel that we paid for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to see-- get in the city and find some people. Allura, you be safe--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- and silent and swift, and you get back here as quickly as possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What time is it? When was the last time we actually took a nap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's been quite a while, you guys have been running since before the meeting in the Cloudtop District.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which happened at nighttime, remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It happened at dusk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's already morning the next day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, it's evening now for you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time approximately? After midnight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's after midnight, 1AM.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, fudge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hot fudge?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I Druidcraft a little tulip and hand it to Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes it, nods, places it in one of the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In case we need to be in contact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if we go now, we have the benefit of darkness in the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hang on, we're going to go now, without resting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not saying that, I'm weighing our options. If we go now, we can go under the cover of night, but we're going to be exhausted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And dragons don't care about night. They can see perfectly fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we've learned that much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let's lie down and take a nap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take a nap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time-- Wait, hang on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sleep as little as possible that will actually get us rested.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A short rest or a long rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Long rest is eight hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we sleep and get up in the morning and hit it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll at least give everybody time to go to ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. I mean, can I sense Thordak and figure out, I mean, is he just settling in that one spot? Is there anything else around or is it just him in the center, being a dick, and no other movement of other things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You took a while earlier to concentrate and you focus on that point again. Thordak is this giant oppressive force of dragon kin in the center of the city, seemingly not moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And last week, you said that Vex couldn't sense the other three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They went to hit the other cities, obviously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have one 5th-level spell left. I can Commune with Nature and try and find out if a few people are still left in the city before we go to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Might as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we're not going out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can Commune with Nature and try to find certain people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we? Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I go out to Pike and the Sarenrae temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're calmer right now, but you can see a lot of them are still consoling each other and talking and as soon as you walk in they're like-- a couple of them step up immediately like, "What's going "on, is everything all right?" "I'm sorry. Mom, I'm sorry" They start crying and, "Shh! It's okay, "it's okay. Is everything all right? Are we safe here? Is this okay?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You will be all right. Everyone calm down. We've had a rough day and it's been hard on everyone but you should be safe here for the evening. Hopefully. Everyone--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I'm not-- I'm trying on this whole leadership thing, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Surprisingly, I rolled a one. First roll of the night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any little bit of hope works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, apparently. So the one man who stood up, and the younger child to him, looks around and he tells her, "Shh! Go lay down. Very well, thank you again. We're sorry for--" Everyone else in the room nods in agreement and you see they're dirt- and tear-stained and all just happy to not be on fire right now or frozen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any injuries in the room that we haven't attended to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There have been a few injuries. However, Pike has already taken time with Keyleth to see to them, when they first arrived.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Matt, I was helping, too, mother--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were helping until you were pulled away for the five minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good job, Pike. And you too, Vex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, you know, got to help the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as you guys are having this conversation, Allura and Drake walk their way out to the courtyard and she looks back at the rest of you and goes, "Stay safe, and if anything happens, "find a way to let me know. I will return as soon as I can with what I can find. Possibly who I can find."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Secrets!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't forget to visit Gilmore's Glorious Goods.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not a real place, Travis, it doesn't exist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's Travis? I can't just hop in and out of character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, who are you talking to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your sword. You're promoting Gilmore's to your sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. So as you and Allura embrace, she steps back and gives a nod and looks out to everybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach out and I grab her hand and say, thank you, truly, for everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both are traveling via spark across the countryside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How the fuck do we get that ability?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, but I want it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's so fucking cool. Do you think that was her or do you think that was Drake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drake cast it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, that's so cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go to sleep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm doing my Commune with Nature spell. I drop down and mediate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hindsight is ten--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, three facts of your choice. As you sit in the temple quietly and connect yourself with the land and the foliage of the surrounding area of Emon, what are your questions?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I sense Gilmore's presence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the radius on this, three miles?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A few miles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do sense a presence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A presence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A very weak presence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp) Oh, no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could mean he's far away or that he's dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I focus in even harder and find where that presence is coming from more directly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The direction that best you can ascertain is it's in the direction of Abdar's Promenade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where his shop is, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Last question, do I sense Uriel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within your three-mile range, you do not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He got to moving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or he's dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, when you are sensing things, does that mean you would sense if they were alive or you wouldn't sense them at all if they were dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The questions were: are they in the city? Which direction are they? Those are essentially the answers that you get through the connection of nature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so they could be dead in the city and you'd still sense them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. It's hard to say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could have gone to the harbor. He could have fled through the tunnels we don't even know about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could have a teleportation circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should check his shop first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. If Uriel's farther away, it's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe he's dead, maybe he's gone, I don't know, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's a moo point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about this, let's find Gilmore, if he's alive or dead then that will answer a lot of questions, how's that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if he did not make it, we still go to his shop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Use whatever's left. It's what Gilmore would want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go then, if it hasn't been ransacked already.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go find that magic fucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're going now? Tonight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sleep and then go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, maybe we should go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we stealth in and see what we can see? I don't know, I feel like we need to rest, y'all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How bad are we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughing) I should probably rest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm at 25.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty low and I'm almost out of dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can stay guard with the rest of everybody else, because I'm okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're expecting-- Thordak is expecting to sit on us like a bunch of eggs in a basket. We're fine for the night, we go tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys take a long rest?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quick question, where is the skull?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fucking-- that was my question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, what are you talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who had the skull last?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You expect me to remember those sort of things?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I remember.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either you have it or I have it. I don't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last person to hold it was Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was Vex. Okay, excellent. I have a perfectly reasonable hiding place or, if you like, you can take it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, your ass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I think it's reasonably well-hidden at this moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well-hidden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guilt rides on you as well. You guys complete your long rest, you restore full hit points and you get back half of your max hit dice. You can only get back half, so if you spent more than half of your hit dice, you're still at-- just so you guys are aware of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what? We only restore half each night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not half of what's missing, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So if you used eight of your hit dice, you are only going to get back, at level 12, six hit dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good to know. I don't think I used any.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hasn't come up too much beforehand, but I want to make sure you guys were aware of that. Anyway, as you come to in the morning, you can smell-- you're used to Laina cooking a very nice breakfast. You smell food being cooked, but it's much more basic for the masses. As you eventually groggily find your way downstairs, pardon the pun, you can see there is essentially a gruel pot and there is a soup line and food is being served best to their capabilities to the people that have taken refuge in Greyskull Keep. You are welcome to do as you please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should head out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to march into the city?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to march under the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to check out that tunnel first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The tunnel just goes to the other side of the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't even know where the tunnel is. We need to find an entrance to said tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tunnel, actually--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then-- sorry, I was going to say and then when we get to the the city, then we figure out what we do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, good thinking. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Leave it to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you are going to have to almost crawl through at your height and everyone else would have to hunch down, except for you and Pike are fine. You guys are tiny enough. It's about a gnome-sized tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you guys go into the pantry, Laina is like, "Oh, don't-- I'm trying-- where's everyone going?" and sees you all clown-car into the pantry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we left, I wanted to find Jarett really fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Jarett is currently outside of the keep in the main courtyard area, crossbow at the ready, keeping his eyes to the sky, mostly looking off in the direction of Emon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up and I hand him a bag of 300 gold and I say, this is, far and away, so much more than we asked you to do when we hired you. And I appreciate everything you're doing. Take care of the keep. Use this money to take care of the people here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it and throws it in the air and catches it. "I appreciate that. I take great pride "in my work and I assure you, I would sooner die than let this place fall."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I give him additional 100 gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm doing my job, but your generosity is noted."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, he's so honorable!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is his hair blowing in the wind as he rejects that amount?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hair is really short.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I resist the urge to mug down with him and I walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you waiting for? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you might die. He might die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of that Marquet-- (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sexy, sexy exotic accent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and that Ank'Harel caramel skin. Jarett's a hottie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a flair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you hear that? It's pens hitting the paper. It's fanfiction right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There has been no sufficient seismic activity or impact above ground to warrant that directly above the tunnel. And you continue to trudge ahead and it's pitch black. Those of you with darkvision probably take the forefront.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a light vision? I'm on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go ahead and light up a hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you guys, all of you have low-light, darkvision. You're fine and Percy is the only one who needs the aid in this. But as you continue forward for a good 25, 30 minutes or so, the tunnel comes to a small stop and there's a very simple rope ladder that leads upward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put my hood up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's going up first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything past that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ladder goes up and goes into a small wooden slat. It's not even a door. It's almost like a wood pallet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get up there. See what you see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You sneaky dick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, at the bottom of the ladder, because she's right behind me. You know, you never cease to impress me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you go up. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, good to know. So, as you get up to the top, you feel the wooden slats on top and as you push, there's not any weight to them. They give way immediately, and as you push it aside, you can see you're inside a small wooden structure. It is enclosed and a little bit of the morning light is peeking through the space between the slats of wood. Looking about the general size and height, it appears to almost be an outhouse structure, but there is no actual outhouse here or, at least where there once was, has recently been converted to the exit of your tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right there with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a door that leads out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I will crack it an inch and look through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There is a chain on the outside of the door that keeps it shut with a big, thick lock at the bottom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there enough room to get my hand through to the other side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, yes, with your experience and your lithe form, you manage to just eke it through and you can get your wrist past, but anything beyond--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm double-jointed, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that double joint you get

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so, I can feel a lock there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to one-hand pick this lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll. This is a difficult maneuver, even with your experience. Given that you can't actually see the front of the lock, you're having to literally feel your way through it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll high, you pointy-eared bastard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like unclasping a bra.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) 30? With a single moment, you, actually feeling with one thumb, you're feeling the vibration of each tumbler on the inside of the lock and as each one progressively clicks, you eventually get to the fourth one before (tink) and it hangs open loosely, within a matter of 40 seconds. You wish other people would have seen that happen because that was pretty, pretty cool maneuver. But you know, at least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on up. It wasn't even locked.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's so modest. Oh no, we lost Ashley! We lost an Ashley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got it. I've got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cleric down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all climb back up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth, stealth, stealth, everybody. I cast Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. She's going to call back. She said we turned into robots. She disconnected.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gotcha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good. So--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait! How's Trinket going to climb up this rope, y'all? Polymorph?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do have Polymorph.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to make him tinier, anyway. What do you want him to be?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should leave him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, for the record, Trinket going through this tunnel looks like the cleaner in Labyrinth. It fills the entire tunnel. He's like (bear noises) having to pull his way through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, what if we polymorph him into a very small raccoon? But he's got hands, you know, so he can hold things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about a wolverine or a badger?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Honey badger doesn't care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honey badger don't give a shit. It just takes what it wants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I polymorph Trinket, can I then use Beast Sense to be able to see through him? Would that be able to work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does Beast Sense do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beast Sense lets me see through the eyes of a beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can do that with Trinket regardless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But does it stack with Polymorph? And if he is like polymorphed into-- I mean, I guess he's still a beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will lose one to do the other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and Beast Sense is concentration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Polymorph a concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it is. So one or the other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine. But if I turned him into a bird, I can make him an aerial scout, is what I was thinking, like the wargs in Game of Thrones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you can become one yourself. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will make him a cute little sewer rat or like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! He can hang on to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, make him something!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will he still get his armor?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I make him a lemur? (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But lemurs are slow, dude. Raccoons are cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about a red panda?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Red panda!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to make him a red panda!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Red panda. That's cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, can a red panda climb a rope ladder any better than--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you decide on a red panda.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a good breed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mystical red panda from Wildemount. You extend your hand and Trinket's form shrinks into this small, temporarily elevated red panda, and falls to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, I love you! He's so cute! I pick him up and I tell him to hang on to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does and wraps around your neck like the foxtail you already have there. You guys climb up and as you emerge, you see now, you're at the very, very back of an alleyway that is buttressed against the inside of the outer wall. So you're inside the city. You're in this small, very, very well-out-of-the-way alleyway, this back alley that ends at your outhouse, as well as a secondary one next to you that appears to be functional, based on the smell. And there is trash and junk back here. It's definitely one of the forgotten corners of Emon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have your map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're right here. Where's Gilmore's again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Abdar's Promenade, to the northeastern--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth. Can we all stealth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's up here. Wow, we have to cross the entire city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we've got Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we could go along the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the way along the outside wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to go through the city or along the outside of the city? Are we going to take the long way or the direct path?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The long way, the slow way, the careful way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take the beltway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealthy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stealthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Everyone roll stealth, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You add ten because--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We add ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, stealth for you as well with disadvantage, but you add ten. Still there, Ashley?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ashley?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hanging up on you. I still love you, but I'm going to hang up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, call back, and you guys, stealth checks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You added ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add ten to it. Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 35, then, motherfuckers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, 29, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there we go, and 19 with the plus ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I rolled shitty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. There we go. Hi, Ashley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Ashley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can she hear?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (robot voice) Hello, I am Pike. I am happy to be here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I forgot you can do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashley rolled a four. She texted me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys step out of this alleyway and the first thing that catches you is the visual.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Chained back up the outhouse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you chained it back and put the lock back on. As you step back out into the center of the first road you come across, the crossroads to this alleyway, you look up and can see there are, even through the night, a good two dozen streams of smoke billowing out from different parts of the city, where, throughout the entire evening, there has been buildings burning, crumbling, or fires of indeterminate origin throughout the city that are still spreading. There's the perpetual smell of smoke and dust in the air, and you can see every now and then, the wind will blow a bit and a little bit of ash will be thrown up in the air and come to rest. Much of what you see around you is intact, the buildings directly around you on this side, everything seems intact, though there's very little signs of life on this immediate corner. It looks like either everyone is inside or this part of the city has been abandoned or people are keeping out of the streets at this point. So, what do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go along the wall to the other side to get to Gilmore's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sneaky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys coast along the wall, to the very southward side, trudging up across the main gate, which as you can see now-- there's normally a very heavy guard presence on the south gate to Emon. The gate is currently partially opened and you can see a bunch of the guards as well as a number of individuals in the city currently frozen in place in the midst of a sudden bit of chaos. You can see the guards with shields and pikes at the ready, screaming and looking up into the sky, their final moment trapped now in that frozen horrifying visage. You see people running, trying to make their way out of the gate, and couldn't quite get past in time and the gate itself has a large sheet of ice that is frozen against it that's slowly thawing. You can see the ground around them is turning muddy with all the moisture that's slowly melting away as the day progresses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they're like the people in our keep? They're past the point of healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly check and inquire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, leave it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see if Cure Wounds is-- I'm going to just try?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I assist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you go up and reach out and cast Cure Wounds on one of the frozen bodies, and your hands touch it and you can feel the ice because it's still very cold to the touch, though it's damp and the moisture is gathering and dripping down off certain elbows and portions of the body that are the lowest. You complete the spell and feel the warmth of the cure spell extend past your fingers with no sign of reaction or life within the body. This poor woman, apron on, looking over her shoulder running, holding what little belongings she had, is there, her final moment captured as she stares off in the direction of where you assume Vorugal swooped towards the south gate, before making their way towards Greyskull Keep the night before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go before we're discovered, quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys tread across the main thoroughfare, and it's the one point where you are inescapably out in the open, and as you're taking a moment touching the corpse of this woman frozen in place, Vex, you catch out the corner of your eye what appears to be a figure stepping towards you in the center of the street.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you see someone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you notify the rest of the group, you guys look over and you can see now, stepping from one of the alleyways, there is a humanoid figure walking through the road, cloak draped behind in the back, hood up, wide shoulders, and is not seemingly making any attempt to be unseen or really hiding their presence. This is someone who is beelining for your group in this moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's heading towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, does he see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heading right towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take out a arrow and say, stop!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do flame hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The figure stops for a moment and pulls the hood back, and you can see now, revealed, a-- looking humanoid but the features are more intense and thick. A very square jaw. The skin has a slight grayish-green tint to it. What looks like one tooth underneath, and this is a half-orc individual. Wearing a black cloak and very simple studded leather armor. If our guest would like to step on to the stage.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! Mixing it up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, just to let you guys know, we have a guest joining us this evening. The illustrious and talented Jason Charles Miller, who is an--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is he going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between you guys right there. Yeah, there you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come squeeze.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jason is going to join us for this evening of gameplay.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: My first action will require me to get up, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jason is a voice actor, actually the voice of Drizzt Do'Urden right now, if you know who--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shut the fuck up! I didn't know that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so that's pretty awesome. As well as the writer of our theme song, our Critical Role theme song, which we are working on a new intro right now. And in the near future we will have that for you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can download it on iTunes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can. We will have that coming out soon but yes, so Jason, thanks for joining us tonight.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Sure, thanks for having me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Jason.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll give you the full, whole-- at end the show, but nonetheless the half-orc approaches, lowers his hood.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Okay, so I actually start speaking in Thieves' Cant to Vex here, so I've got to whisper something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. So as the orc lowers his hood, he begins to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't you make him come over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who are you talking about?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Vax, sorry, the-- The person that can speak Thieves' Cant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can speak Thieves' Cant, too.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: But I'm talking to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thieves can't speak. Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And whispers to the two of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These are tiny tables.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So suddenly the orc begins to utter a series of strange sounds like double talk and gibberish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm reading his damn lips as he's doing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and you, knowing Thieves' Cant, pick up the details. So you can let her know as well. The rest of you see this orc speaking nonsense and a very brief reaction from the twins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, he's been under a lot of stress, all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our thetan levels are off the charts right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My thetan level's at 16 right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a member of the Clasp, then?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: You're the first faces I recognize. I've been hiding here since the attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You recognized us, why? How?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I'm a member of the Clasp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you all make it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were there recently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's left?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I don't know. I was on a mission up above ground when the attack happened. I'm trying desperately to get back to see who is left. My name is Garthok.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Garthok?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My name is Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I know who you are, and you are the first people I've made myself visible to. You're the first people that I recognize or even know that I can trust.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you been through the city? How much is left?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: It is not-- it's indescribable. There is incredible destruction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you encountered any more survivors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which you have. As you walked through the city, you have noticed there are many survivors of the town. A lot of them have kept inside, but there are a number that are actually running through and looting the town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was your name again?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Garthok.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Garthok. What of the Spirelings? What of the leaders of the Clasp?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: All I know is what I knew before the attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've come here looking for survivors. We don't intend to stay long. You are welcome to come with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you one of the people looting? You said you saw other people doing the same.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I'm not a looter. I was on a classified mission above ground, and now that's all gone to shit basically, so I'm trying to get back to our headquarters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Garthok, are you familiar with tunnels or secret passageways around the city at all?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: You could say yes. Absolutely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we near any?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get across town and not be seen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are trying to get to the Abdar's Promenade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, show me your brand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reveals the back of the cloak and you do indeed see the brand of the Clasp. The same one you carry between the shoulder blades.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know each other? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a pretty big organization.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one north of Abdar's Promenade that could possibly be of use to you. Those are the only ones that come to mind that are nearby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We stop by Gilmore's and we do need to check in with the Clasp, anyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to be helpful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we out in the open right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are out in the open right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we fucking get inside, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know where that is?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Yes, I can lead you there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Underground?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I could, if the temple entrance wasn't destroyed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might be able to clear it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to walk towards the temple?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're near the Temple District now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can take the tunnels under--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if the entrance to the tunnel was destroyed, it's best not to risk it. Let's keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we'll make a lot of noise clearing it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Best to skirt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Building to building.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay with stealth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might be able to tunnel us to the closest tunnel system, from right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you intend to do this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move Earth. Sixth level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, you're using a 6th-level spell right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to do it now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not near the entrance to the tunnel right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, let's just stealth it. Yeah, save that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can save that for an emergency.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll save it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It will take you, at the rate at which it moves earth, it will take you probably a good hour to two hours to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To get to the tunnels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get to any sort of system that he may be referring to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's just walk. We'll walk faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, Garthok, I'm going to have you roll a stealth check to move alongside the rest of the group.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Great. 25.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he benefit from Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he arrived after the spell was cast, but as you guys move forward, he also dives into the shadows in a very similar way that you've seen Vax do before. This orc definitely understands the resources of light and the absence of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's played some Assassin's Creed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He's hitting you all up in the shoulders for change. All right, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a dice game?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a band, they're very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see on the outskirts of some of these piles of rubble, bodies lying in the street, the skin charred black and cracked as the face and arms are curled up in the final moments of agony. You avert your gaze and continue pressing onward and you can see now, many of these large temples in the center of the city, you can see folks gathered to them and clustered on the inside, you can hear people shouting and folks trying to deal with this current circumstance befalling the town. You continue to move out of the sight of those clusters of survivors that are going to their various deities for aid and comfort. You push further towards the center of the Temple District. You do catch out of the left the sound of breaking glass, specifically to you, Vex, in the distance. As you glance over and look, you can see four individuals climb out of a window with sacks over their shoulders. They all gesture to each other and go running off northward, deeper into the city, carrying whatever goods they managed to acquire from the interior. And as you progress, you do notice a lot of windows have been broken. You don't know if from the inside or outside. Some may have been from the impact of the attack, some may have been from individuals that have been moving from building to building. It's hard to say at this point, there's such disarray around you. As you skirt along the very far end of the Temple District, you see a portion of the neighborhood now is in itself encased in ice, like the individuals you saw at the south gate. This is another area where Vorugal made its way through, and you can see another array of icy coffins of other individuals who were trying to escape but were locked in place. You can see a small group of living Emon residents that are currently gathering the dead and trying to take them out of the open and possibly give them a proper burial, whether it be people they know or not, but there is a look on each of their faces of desolate acceptance of what is happening and trying to process this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I slink back to Vax? And I say: you still think that what was inside that skull is worse than all of this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it is probably equal to this. We've been burned before, Grog. This was going to happen whether we wanted it to or not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but we could have done something about it. I walk on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big if, big man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see broken bits of wood and wagon wheels tossed asunder like, apparently, one of these dragons may have smashed into the center and let loose its fury. You can see spatters of blood across elements of the ground, but no sign of a body, as there are a few groups going around, trying to gather what they can, but the place is also picked clean. You notice a lot of these tents and carts are empty of any real valuables. You are uncertain whether or not the proprietors took it themselves or they have been picked clean by looters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scavengers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to approach, with a very, very nervous heart, the corner of the bazaar that leads to Gilmore's place. As you approach, the nervousness is met with the visual of a large stack of black smoke that rises from that direction. As you push through with increased haste towards that area of the bazaar, you see Gilmore's Glorious Goods, as well as two other adjacent buildings, completely destroyed. Piles of rubble and what looks to be a group of about ten individuals that are currently picking through the rubble and gathering what they can, moving over wood and brick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stop stealthing and walk right into it and start shouting, (shouting) get the fuck out of here! Get out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, all of them turn over, looks and one says, "Hey, get your own shit, all right?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Move on now! Now! Now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stops and looks about the other one. The other guys looking over their shoulders and, "Look, we're all just trying to stay alive here, okay?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out my gun. You heard the man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, big sword comes out, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fire hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't test us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've had a really shitty day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've had a shitty day?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've all had a shitty day

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, let's make it all sorts more shitty," And he pulls a shortsword from his side and all the rest of them pull their blades out and they say, "Look, we saw this first. We're going to "bring it to him and save ourselves."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll fucking gut you like a fish--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --and take your innards--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- out your mouth. I will not!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop. You will take it to him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thordak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all, with their weapons out, tense their shoulders and say, "There's only one way we "are going to survive this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Listen. There's so much more available to you, buildings up that way. Not worth your time right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Honey, we've already picked plenty clean from this pile. This is our third time back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll be your last time back if you're not careful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it worth your death? Bringing this to him, is it worth your death? Because you will die here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You know what, I think I stand a better chance against the lot of you than with that thing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just thought wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Step on and go find loot somewhere else. At least then you can present it to him and not die here. Don't be stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex, please let me off the chain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, I rolled so poorly. Anybody want to assist me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little late for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) How about ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can see as he's holding his shortsword to the side, goes, "You know, you may "be stupid, but there are other stupid things in this town, like walking in the middle of an "ambush, dear." At which point, a dagger comes past--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got passive perception!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need everyone to roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck these assholes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is everything I wanted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural fucking 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Therapeutic ass-kicking. That's pretty good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They may win.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah. Fuck that. We're way more pissed off--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They work for a dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they? They're just looters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to feel really good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they're innocent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we're not going to kill them. We'll just beat their faces in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Garthok, did you lead us here? Did you know about this?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight check. Can I insight check him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We literally just walked to where we were going. He lead us precisely where we wanted to go. There's nothing clever about that trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, placement, guys. Where would you like to be on this one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you got up in their face, so you're--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The three of us got up in their face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was walking with Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was hanging back a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm next to Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Vex, you're up here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, why not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were up in their face right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In his face and I have Trinket on my back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one is Jason Charles Miller?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jason is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gart-Garthluk.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Garthok.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Garthok, Garthok, I'm close. I'm getting it, Garthok.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Garthok, where do you want to be?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I'm ready to tangle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll put you over here, in the middle of the group being watched. The rest of these thugs are all currently sitting over in this rubble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you think, Garthok? I don't know, what do you think, Waynethok?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, I would like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we be at all concerned about drawing attention to ourselves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Too late for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I mean, like, giant Fireballs or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably stay away from huge magical effects.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fireball straight into the sky!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there you go, that'd be perfect. All right, so, initiatives 25 to 20 or higher?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 27. Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth. All right, 15 to ten? What do we got?
