lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we got--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two 12s and two 14s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then 12 and 12. All righty. And is Pike not able to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll try!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike lost completely all connection.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike fell down in some rubble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll roll for her. (laughs) Pike's going last. I figure she probably would have rolled last anyways, so Pike is last.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think she said she was probably going to have to leave until the break until we can figure out the tech.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Hunter's Mark on that motherfucker in front of me. And then I'm going to cast Conjure Barrage at all of them in front of me, like a big cone effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Okay, so, Conjure Barrage is your action, so that's your full thing. So, at which direction are you doing it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just towards all the guys in front of me. I want to get as many in the cone as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you probably need to move this way or else you're going to hit your brother as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's my brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your brother right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can see what's happening now. Yeah, I move over then I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 60 foot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a 60-foot cone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, right there. So all four of them are affected. Great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a red panda.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Until she breaks concentration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fire it and I shoot forward and that's it, huh? I don't have to, like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Conjure Barrage, you roll damage and they get to save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool. So I'm going to cast that at-- oh, it's already at third level, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. 15? And then I add my type anything? Or it's just 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just 15, and then you add 1d6 for the one dude for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my Hunter's Mark. Do I add my Bracers of Archery, though, on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically-- You know what, sure. Because it is technically a ranged attack. I'll let it happen, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 and an additional six on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On that guy? Okay, what's your DC of your spells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I add my spell attack bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to roll to attack. This just happens and they have to try and save to get out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. All right so, that's 17 damage to-- those two take half there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It will sink in in a few episodes. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Cool. All right so, as you release this spraying torrent of arrows down the way. It fires outward. All of them all of a sudden have to put their arms up to instinctually defend themselves with arrows piercing bits of their armor and ricochet off. It's not horribly damaging, but enough to sweep into all of them and they all immediately look up angrily at each other, weapons at the ready to go ahead and get vengeance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take the rest of my moment to back up against a wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Right there. All righty, Percy, you're up next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to Hex the one that she Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Fuck that one guy in particular.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to-- Where am I? Oh, there I am. I'm going to run towards that other wall to the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, all the while taking a few shots at that bastard who I just hexed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and Sharpshooter shots, because that's funnier. So that's, ugh--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so that's not-- That's 14 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should I just roll all three shots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll three shots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 20. That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And 18. That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so go ahead and roll damage for all three shots, and an additional 1d6 to each shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah. That's ten, 26, 27 points. 26 points plus one necrotic. That's on the other end of things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The opposite! (laughs) The exact opposite.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Irony. 17 points plus six necrotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And for my final roll. 17, 18, 19, 20, 25 points plus six necrotic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That guy is dead, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so, as you go running by (gunshots) each shot as it impacts, the guy who's already dealing with the array of arrows in his chest, each shot that blows across his shoulders is followed by a plume of black-purple smoke that blasts off each impact until it leaves a hole off this shoulder. This actually blows this arm off from the impact. And the third one just destroys the upper part of his head and he slinks back onto the rubble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I move my Hex to the next guy and point at him as I'm running.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I move my Hunter's Mark to the next guy because the other one went to zero.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's some Hateful Eight shit right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, you have to use a bonus action to mark a new creature. Both you guys do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So those will be-- Those move over when-- (gunshot impact) He is blown off the map essentially.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It said when it went down to zero, I could move it to the next person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If the target drops to zero hit points, you can use a bonus action on subsequent turns of yours to mark a new creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's so many rules, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it's their turn now. So, out the side, after that final shot, you hear a little guttural grunt off to your left as you see this dwarf with a giant hammer come rushing up. "You! "How dare you!" And comes swinging off towards your direction there, off to the side. These guys here are going to move in. Both of these are going to run up to Grog, being the larger there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just signed your death certificate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guy comes up to Keyleth. These two come rushing around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, there's two more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't see those guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you didn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw one of them, but I didn't see all of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That guy can only get that far, so he's going to go ahead and throw. All right, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to get sneak attacks on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. All right, so, first and foremost, the dwarf comes up against you, Percy. That's going to be an 18 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My armor class is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it hits, yeah. And it's going to hit you again this time. That's going to be 15, so only--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, can I take that first 18 and make it-- nah, you know what, I'll take the hit, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take eight points of bludgeoning damage from the smack of the mace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slap-a the mace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two guys against Grog now, their maces out as well. Because they have pack tactics, they both have advantage on attacks against you. So with that, that's a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. And the other one, with advantage, is a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not raging yet, so you take full damage. All right, ten points of bludgeoning damage on the first hit. And the second one, that's going to be 15 points of bludgeoning damage. So a total of 25 points of bludgeoning damage as both of them whack you with maces from each side, with the first round of attacks. Now the second round of attacks, because they attack twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage. That's a 21, which hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you then take seven points of bludgeoning damage after that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. So that's two. There's one against you, Vax. He doesn't get advantage against you. He rolls a 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Uncanny Dodge-- No! It doesn't hit because I've got both daggers out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, because you get bonus AC.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have three armor classes depending on if my boots are on or my daggers are in my hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Okay, cool. Good to know. All right, so then leading up to that, there's one against you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be 15 points of bludgeoning damage against you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whack! As the mace swings past and catches you right across the chin, the impact causes your head to snap for a second. A very minor moment of whiplash, as you look back and feel the blood trickling down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 doesn't hit? Okay, so that's three attacks on you that hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, two attacks hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, two attacks. You take nine points of bludgeoning damage and six points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the one that's over here, there's nobody immediately around for it pull its mace out. Instead, he pulls out his heavy crossbow, lines up, and aims at you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what? Who, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm-- Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is 21 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You then suffer ten points of piercing damage as the heavy crossbow bolt sinks itself into your shoulder and the armor takes the brunt of it but you can still feel the pain of it piercing just about an inch through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their go. Next up, we have Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm really pissed off at this guy who just decked me in the face. So I'm going to cast Call Lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And can I reach out and, the guy who hit me, can I reach out and grab him and call it right into him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like conductor-style.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Just grab his face after he just punched me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, the minute you do that, the Polymorph fades and Trinket turns into a full bear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope! Even cooler! Totally meant to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, but know wherever the bolt hits, it's everything in a five-foot area. So you can hit the bolt behind him--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah, I want to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to take it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pissed the

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you put your hands up, the clouds that are already forming from the storm--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, I get extra damage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They begin to grow darker and directly above you and as you bring your hands up, your flames slowly drifting off your fingertips, you bring your hand down, and as you do, a bolt of lightning comes streaking out of the sky, blasting right into the guy in front of you. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it four? Do I get an extra d10? Is that what I get, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get an additional d10, yes. 4d10 lightning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get anything extra because I'm holding on to him? Because I'm channeling it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say no, that's more--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fire damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that would be a different attack, unfortunately. You're holding him and the flames are licking up into his face. So it's a scary visual.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 25 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of damage. He did not make the save, I believe. Rolled a 15. What's your DC on that spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So the bolt comes down and I need you to go ahead and make a save against your own spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. Failed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you also take that damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it was cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use my bonus action to go Minxie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, I like it! We ain't seen Minxie in a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's been a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the guy's looking, reeling from the impact of the blast, he pulls away, smoke coming off his chest. He gets his mace ready as he looks up and sees you change into this giant white sabretooth tiger with these claws--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get a little bit of foam going, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it just got somehow weirder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This means I can finally use my gift from Mary!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends Keyleh's turn. Garthok, you're up.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Great, I move over and take that one on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: No. Okay now. Sorry. Yes. No, wait, okay, I was going to go to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have laser pointers at the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone give him a laser pointer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I had it and I was distracted.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: There.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right here? Got you, okay. So you rush up to there.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: And I flank. Since they're engaged, can I use my sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you hit, you hit with the sneak attack. So as you rush out very quickly, you see he pulls out a spear, like a short spear, but it's curved kris-like at the blade and it's smaller than most short spears you've seen. It's a custom piece of work. And he slides up and attempts to jam it into the thug in front of you.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Get it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits. Go ahead and roll damage and sneak attack damage.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Hell yeah. So, let's see, I need some more d6s. Do you want me to do the sneak attack damage first or the weapon damage first, or add it all at the end?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just add it all together and then add your modifier at the end.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grr. I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're on deck, so be ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is what life is about, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was the night Marisha took somebody's eyes out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) I know, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of damage. Nice! All righty. So, as the spear easily pierces past armor and you can see the haggard-looking woman then looks over and the spear itself is stuck in her midsection. As you withdraw it, you can see a gout of blood pour out afterward of the wound itself, leaving behind a pretty nasty--

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orc jaw quivers, the teeth exposed. Okay, is that your turn?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you still have a bonus action if you wanted to disengage.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Oh, yeah. So I can disengage without attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you use disengage and then move past. You moved three spaces. You can disengage and move back four more spaces if you want to, with your speed. Your call. Or you can stay there and lock him in place.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: You know what? I'm going to stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. At which point, the blood touching the blade, it curves down the obsidian and then sinks into the actual weapon. It doesn't even have a moment to drip before the blade seems to absorb the blood that you put on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would also like to use reckless attack as I take my three attacks at this piece of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's a bonus action to rage, so you get two attacks this turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two attacks this turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Reckless attack it up, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. These are Great Weapon Master?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. And that is-- not great, that's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 still hits. These guys aren't very well-armored.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Loser! Loser with your 11 AC!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 22 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And they both have to make the DC saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both against the same individual?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, same guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see it cuts a huge gash across the upper body as the burly-looking looter glances back at you (heavy breathing). Brings up a shortsword and is about to go in for the pierce, at which point you kick her away from you about a foot and draw the blade around, and this time you run the blade right into her torso, piercing her through. As she looks up at you, you can see her skin go pale as her strength is drawn into the blade. You get to add a point to your strength.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What! How long does that last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That lasts until your next short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't rest ever! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, your strength's now 18, so add plus one to your attack damage going forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus one to damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you pull the blade out and she crumples to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So for every person you hit, it makes it better and better and better!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look over my shoulder to the guy on the left and like, you're next!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You very much can. You can see the visual of this presentation seems to have shaken their resolve, though not enough to the point where they're backing down yet. The desperation kicks in. All right, that ends your turn, Grog? You're staying there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so the guy next to Percy is the dwarf?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I will hand-cone it up and I will cast Dominate Person on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will try to bend him to my will.

lines.name: MATT
