lines.text: So now you can take the other guy, because you killed him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I critted on the third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third one, I'll say because you killed him the third crit goes to the next guy, so go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And now you get your additional attack because of the Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my lord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage, because barbarians, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is why relentless attack is so good with them. They take the penalty to their AC.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, 34 points of damage because it's Great Weapon Master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Failed save. All right. It made the last one, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, plus two, 36 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've never been more happy in my life.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man, I'm coming back as a barbarian if I die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, there's more people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one guy over here by Keyleth who currently hasn't even noticed what's going on because he got hit with lightning twice and is being attacked by a giant tiger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I guess I'll try to intimidate him to stop, and I'll say, I'll turn to him and say, you there! Idiot! (stutters) You're not going to win! You should not fight anymore! Because you're going to die. And that's it, that's all I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll intimidation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Worst intimidation ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And yet the conviction behind the words-- the heart behind each stuttered moment of that sentence--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, I'll sing to him to intimidate him, would that help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I will sing, (singing) Some people call me a gnome cowboy. Some people call me the gangster of love.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nobody calls him the gangster of love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Playing my music on my shawm, oooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, right where the guitar would go (high-pitched guitar), you hear the clanging of weapons to the ground as the other remaining thug looks around and sees the mess that you've made of all of his various compadres and immediately drops to the ground, hand over his head, going: "I'm sorry! I'm sorry! I'm sorry!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We shouldn't have taken him hostage. I wanted to just kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, don't worry.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: We can still kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And as my bonus action, I tell the dwarf to start collecting all the stuff from all the other people as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's dark. That's dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so there's the one guy who's on the ground now, hands over his head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he the only one left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's the only one left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the dwarf who is looting things now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stay in Minxie form and stay on him, growling at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I, actually, you know what? Instead of looting, I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slowly the rain begins to hit as the storm finally starts coming down, elevated by the druid spells that brought the moisture to gather over this section. You walk over to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm actually going to start using perception to look for any sign of Gilmore in the rubble or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gilmore? Use your dragon perception, lady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This would be more of an investigation check. As you begin to pore over the rubble yourself to gather it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I leave him to you all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's the meat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was my turn in initiative, so I want to walk over to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20 on investigation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's going to be good. That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So you walk over, so as she's investigating it, you go ahead and you walk over to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're coming with me. I lift him up and I'm leading him off around the corner of a building.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pace along as Minxie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Garthok, you doing anything?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I go with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the half-orc saunters up next to the tiger and you guys disappear around the corner of one of the nearby buildings.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I just start cleaning my spear in front of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pace around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Look, look, what do you want?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you knocking him out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whack, you take him off the side of the head and he crumples into a pile there in the alley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pick up some shit from the ground and prop it up against him, a couple of pieces, not bury him, just hide him a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then I walk back to the group and I start picking shit up around where my sister is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go back, I guess. I was useful.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I thought we were going to interrogate him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me, too. (laughs) I came along as intimidation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looters?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he was bringing stuff back and forth to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's still there. And we do have a dwarf that's mind-controlled right now. That is probably the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who is currently looting the bodies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't touch anything. I'm investigating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are going through the rubble, you can see a lot of the rubble has been moved over, and you see remnants of shattered glass cases and shelves and a lot of the things that you had previously seen within Gilmore's Glorious Goods, largely picked over and left behind. Many books lie tattered and burned and destroyed as part of the attack. You get the sense here that most anything that was of use or worth has been taken already and what the people here were gathering, they mentioned this was their third time back, they were basically picking up what remnants they could, which were pieces of broken objects, elements of gold that were left behind, but most of the contents of the store have been ransacked and taken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I specifically look for the beaded curtain he emerges from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you notice, looking underneath where the shattered remains of the foot of his bed are, there is a smooth piece of stone with a handle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a barrel of lube.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rush over to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I detect traps now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you could technically detect traps whenever you wanted to try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to have sight for it. If you want to, go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. You take a moment to inspect it. You follow the edge, and yes, it is indeed a false door made of this stone tile that comprises the floor of the room, and it is a hatch. It is not trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start pushing on the bed and call for Grog and say, help me with this!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Oh! Run over. I help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hear her yelling and wander up as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still in Minxie, pace over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dwarf comes running up with you guys as well, still--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he get everything? I mean, did he loot everything, are we--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes up with all the various coin purses which, interestingly enough, are mostly empty other than a few copper. It seems like whatever they've stolen is not on them currently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They gave it to the dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Assholes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They gave it to

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Him. Whatever that is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we ask?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got a happy dwarf standing--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi, dwarf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who have you been collecting swag for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The dragon."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As long as we give him what's important and what's worth, he'll keep us alive. Even protect us."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He told you this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where are you taking it to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To the center of town. Which I've never been before, the Cloudtop itself. What stands is "very pretty."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The gates to it are open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the dragon sits there in the open, collecting his bounty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's lines, folks lined up bringing all they have to him."

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: So if this is your third trip back, the first two, you already took it to him or did you take it somewhere else to store?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we've put it all in a place so that then we can take it to him."

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Take us to that place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." And he turns around and starts walking away.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, not yet!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But wait, tell us where it is, how about that? How about you tell us where it is. Right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he explains about a 15-minute walk from here there is a well that is in between four buildings in an alley cross-section. All of it's been actually put into the well, which has been hollowed out, or all the water's been repressed with dirt, and it's been filled with everything they've gathered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to save eventually. He's going to break your mind control. Maybe we should knock him out right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Knock him out, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, he turns around going, "Ugh."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Knock him out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be surprise because he currently is not aware of the situation, so it's auto-crit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, advantage, all right. Well, that's better. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Go ahead and roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Yeah. Okay. Okay. That's a 13, 16, that's still spinning, (counting), 26. 26 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you double that from the surprise? Because he wasn't even prepared.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, so, uh, okay, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's enough, if you double it. As long as you're over 40, he's down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it would be 40-something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so. He goes out. A little dwarven pile. He's out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tie him up. I don't want him waking up and running back to the dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know how you solve that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand that, Grog. Maybe we should just tie him up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tie him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tie him up and tie him up to a big stone so he can't get up and run even if he--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys take a moment to go ahead and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bow. Tie him in a little bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rain's still pouring down. He's soaked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys gather around the hidden hatch in the floor of Gilmore's room, and we're going to go ahead and take a quick bathroom break.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a wonderful experience.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jar full of farts!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you hear a voice from within the darkness, just out of view from your position, that says, "Whoever you are, leave! Run away or I swear I'll "kill you!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sherri.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sherri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look down and it doesn't appear to be Sherri. It's a woman, frazzled hair. You can't make out the details of her expression, but she's holding this blade in front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't attack!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sherri, it's us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you work here? We're looking for Gilmore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see Sherri now approaches, her hair frazzled. She looks like she's covered in soot, and actually has suffered some minor burns on part of her arm and the side of her face a little bit, and she steps into the little bit of light at the bottom of the shaft and looks up and goes, "My "god. Come in, quick. Please." And she ushers you down into this area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop Minxie form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks around--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stay and guard the unconscious fucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear grunts) and sets into a defensive position now looking out at the rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If they start to wake up, sit on them! Or kill them, if necessary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Staying there, keeping guard. As you all climb down, you notice next to Sherri a very frazzled and harrowed-looking-- the woman who was holding the dagger in front. Her clothing is very, very nice, though currently torn, and filthy. This is Empress Salda Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what, who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Empress Salda Tal'Dorei, the wife of Uriel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Empress! Is Uriel down here? Did you make it out? The children!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts her blade away. She looks over her shoulder. "The children--" She puts her hand to the side and you can see in the back room, which, now you can see, there is a teleportation circle that is slowly lit on the bottom of the floor within this room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was her first name again? Empress what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Salda.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Esalda? With an E?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Salda. S-A-L-D-A. She looks over and you can see her three kids, Odessa, Illya, and Gren, two daughters and son, are all sitting in the corner, talking to each other. They look like how children deal in these type of situations. They're talking and playing games and trying to distract themselves. But as soon as you guys all walk in, they look over, quietly, and their faces brighten up at the arrival of somebody new, and they recognize you as you begin to step into the low light of the chamber. Salda then puts her hand down and says, "I don't believe my husband made "it. But we're alive."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you see him fall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No." And she looks over into the far corner. You can see, amongst the pile of rags and stuff, there is one long pile of dark, crushed velvet blue in the corner, with a small puddle of crimson under it. "He saved us." And, glancing over in the corner, you can now see the shape of Gilmore, slumped in the corner, arm draped over his midsection, head down to the side, in the center of that pool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I run over, I run over. Is he awake? Is he alive? I've got my hand under his chin. Is he alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a very, very strong fever in his body, and there's beads of sweat down the face, and as you look down you can see where the arm is holding there is blood soaked into the robe. You can see parts of the robe right now are currently-- elements of it are burned and charred. You can see parts of it scraped away. Gilmore's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull him in. Pike, Pike, Pike! Keyleth! Come over here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Cure Wounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to be all right. Pike is here, it's going to be all right, it's going to be all right. Gil? Is there any consciousness?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I can try and assist you, Pike, with Cure Wounds. That's all I have right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, is he conscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unconscious. Unconscious, and looking--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fading fast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you, like, Greater Restoration? I mean, what's the best cure you can do, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay okay okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can both make medicine checks to try and put him in a position where he would be more susceptible to healing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can use a sixth level, and Heal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Use the spell Heal?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I did a 16 on my Medicine check, with her 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you guys take a moment, you dress the wounds best you can, and put him in a position where Pike, as you bring forward, you grab your holy symbol, and clutching it between both your hands very tightly, you kneel down in front of the slowly fading body of Gilmore. You can see the shiver occasionally, instinctually in his unconsciousness, and you reach out and touch him, and as you do, the warm light of Sarenrae fills your torso, travels through your arms, and into the body of Gilmore. His arms fall to his side, limp, as the warmth swells up into the torso, and for a second, as the outside of the robe that you saw torn open opens up, you can see now the hideous gash that has currently torn through his abdomen. As the warmth spreads through the body, and the light visually shows the horrible, jagged nature of this wound, the wound stitches itself up and you can see it close, leaving but the tiniest of scar across. The blood itself all still caked into the material, but the wound is now closed. As you pull your hands back, you can see Gilmore's body, which has, from the sheer power of the Heal spell, has actually been elevated a few inches off the ground, and then clatters to the ground as the spell finishes, and you can see he shivers for a second, he curls over. (pained grunt)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull him into my lap, and hold onto him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Sherri instinctively goes, "Is he all right? Is he all right?" She pulls out her glasses, puts them on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think so, I think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who's this one? What is he doing here?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a friend, he fought with us. He's not corrupted by the dragon's influence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd like to know your name, orcish sir."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really cool.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I'm Garthok. I bow. I bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a sideways glance. "Keep your distance. I don't trust you yet." And she turns back around towards Gilmore. As you're holding him there, the children at this point are very quiet and sitting at his foot as you all gather around this corner. A minute passes in silence. Another minute passes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smoothing his hair out. Hey. Hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His body is-- the stillness is maintained, but you can still feel the heartbeat, and you can feel the pulse of blood through the body from holding the shoulders. And then, from that silence, you hear, (weak coughing). And the mouth opens, and the eyes begin to loll open, and the irises begin to try and find some point of focus, and Gilmore slowly lolls the head back up and looks into your face and smiles, instinctually, little blood at the corner of his mouth, and he looks up at you. "Well. That's always what I assumed I'd see in my last moments." (chuckles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bad day, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah... strangely enough, I'm pretty sure I've had worse."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No offense, darling, but you look like shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "We can't have that, can we?" (coughs) Lifts his hand and begins to try and cast a spell. You can see a bit of arcane Prestidigitation begin to try and muster, and he coughs, and the magic sputters and fades.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, either we're all dead or we're all alive. I'd like an answer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I went back for you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? We were so worried about you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're glad you came here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry. When they attacked, my instinct was to grab the children. I got who I could, but "Uriel pushed me away. He was trying to get others out of the fray."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see him fall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't see him fall, but I went back, and I found him fallen."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What was left of it. I brought back Salda and the children. I brought back Asum, and that "abrasive dragon girl. I don't know where they are right now." And Salda chimes in and goes, "They both actually, they left. They went topsoil to try and find other "survivors. I told them not to, I told them to stay, but they're assumedly off in the city "somewhere, trying to make sense of all this."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're trying to collect people at our keep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've turned it into a safe haven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. That's kind of you. That's good of you. That's probably one of the only safe places "in the city right now." (coughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you do anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I can cast Cure Wounds on him to try to help out at all. Will it help? I mean, you know, more than I would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever your fine angel of Sarenrae did I think will hold me fine for now." And he smiles and gives a very, very half-hearted wink towards Pike. "Thank you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you dearly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've certainly earned your name today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could have saved more. I couldn't find you, I couldn't-- I looked."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, no, I, you-- "

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were hard to find.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I figured you would be taking care of yourself. I went-- (chuckles) I went to the dragon "then, just in case you had decided to be your usual foolish selves and run into hell itself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perhaps sent a spy and try to trick him? (chuckles) That would have been stupid, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Very.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore, we called for you. I'm sorry we didn't wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. I'm glad you didn't. You may not be here."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you see any others from the Council? Anyone else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well." And he leans forward, and sits up out of your lap for a second to look at the rest of you. "There are quite a few dead, unfortunately. Brom Goldhand didn't make it. Most "of the guards are gone. Half, if not more, of the Cloudtop District. Killed by the poisonous fume "that took the entire area so suddenly."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poisonous fume?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From the initial dragon attack. We've been staying here for safety's sake. I don't know how "long I've been out. Could we perhaps make our way towards your place as well?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be smart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any point to searching for more Council members or allies before we go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anyone that was alive that you saw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, there were many that were alive by the time I returned. They were all kneeling before "the beast. It's very interesting that when given the face of death before you how quickly folks are "willing to stay alive at whatever cost of morality and sense of society. I don't blame them. I mean, "what other alternative is there, but to stay alive and hope that others come and save them from this "burden?" (coughs) And he coughs up a little blood and wipes it from his chin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the Cinder King have mind control abilities, or is he just super impressive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think it's more that he's very persuasive with his threat of how many did not fare this "attack. I did get a good look at him, before he-- well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everything's gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you saw him, did you see anything important?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did notice in his chest, where the scales of a dragon usually are uniform, there was an "obfuscation of sorts, there was something different about his armor. It was hard to make out "the details in how fast we had a duel. I've never dueled a dragon before! I've dueled a dragon now." (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And fared quite well!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I did not! I survived longer than I hoped, and got out when I could."

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: A weak spot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, did it look like scarring? From a previous fight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't get a very good look, but it looked like there was a different material, "something smooth and jagged. Something that pulsed with power."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't sound like a weak spot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't sound super good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't get a terribly good look, nor do I understand the nature of whatever it was, but--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something to start thinking about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does anyone have any water? I'm a bit parched."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And honestly, if we're going to be moving about on the streets, I'd like you to not fall open like a can of baked beans, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "I'm not going to lie, I'm quite touched by your concern, Grog. It's flattering." (grunts) And he starts trying to stand up, and as he does, Sherri rushes forward and grabs him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm under, too, I'm helping him up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even in this weakened state, still trying to present the best of himself that he can. "All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gilmore, before we go, one more crazy question: you're not a dragon, are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Oh, I wish I was. That would have made this whole endeavor a little easier on my part."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But if you find a way for me to become a dragon, that would be sexy." (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, Gilmore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we teleport, or is there tunnels, or how do we go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I have just a little bit of time? Before we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, with Garthok? Or with Gilmore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, up top. You know, I'll be right back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to go up there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just for a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All by yourself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if you guys want to join, if anybody wants to come with me, but I'm going to stealth like a motherfucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it seemed like we were heading out? Are we heading out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of the reasons why a government allows something like the Clasp to exist in a city like this is because it is a shadow infrastructure that will survive an attack like this. It is an infrastructure designed-- Grog, it's a bunch of people who are really good at making money when everything's working, and when everything stops working, they get very angry and want to make everything work again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I understand that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They have tunnels, they have men, they have spies, they have everything we need. Please tell me if I'm wrong here.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: You couldn't be more right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They might be the friends that we need at this moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I take it you're one of these underlings?"

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I can't speak for the group, but I am a member, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would they listen to you?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I'm sure they would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't like us very much.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: A lot of us didn't like Mordeth either, so more people like you than you may know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where do you want to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to go get that fucking well full of fucking loot. Magical items, gold, who knows what could be in there that could help us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, you want to go steal from Thordak?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no! They never gave it to him. They gathered a bunch of shit and they hid it in a well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he told them to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they were going to get it all together and give it to him, but they never gave it to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were keeping it. They were hiding it away in one place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, a small group goes and gets the gold and the rest of us get Gilmore and the family to the secret passage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Last time we took a dragon's gold, five of them showed up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The dragon doesn't know about the gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you think the dragon knows everything that's going on right now? I'm the spy here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you're scared, then go with Gilmore. I'm going to go get the gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would agree with getting the gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go with the family.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gimme the Bag of Holding, then. Where am I going to put all the gold?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's got a point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you all remember the last time I told you something was a terrible idea?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a few days ago--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was every time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's all the time, really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, right. This is probably another one of those times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on myself and anybody else joining me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm coming too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll come-- wait, no, I should probably go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I hoist Gilmore onto Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello." (chuckles)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not happy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then, don't be pissy about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not leaving you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be right back. I mean, it's magic shit! Gilmore, I'm going to get your shit back for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember the last time we went somewhere to go get a big pile of shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good thing, because, well. I'm going to need it to renovate this place a little." (laughs, coughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a fan of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth like a motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's three? Us three?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Us three. Stealth out. It's like a 15-minute walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What makes you think that they're not going to have a ton of people sitting there watching that well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look out for that shit this time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that, right. That's worked well in the past.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: The area where they're going, where the well is. Is that closer to one of the entrances to the Clasp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one you're going towards? In the direction. It's a little bit past where you're going so you'd have to double back to the entrance, but it is totally a way to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we're all going to the same place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay separate from the group so I can stealth a little bit better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Twins out in front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm stealthing. Pass Without a Trace on all of us, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth checks from all those that are heading towards the well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we all heading towards the well to jump down to the Clasp, or is anybody going back towards the Keep right now?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: The well's farther or the Clasp entrance is farther?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Clasp entrance is closer, the well is further, so you actually go past it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, hang on. Hang on. We're all going to the Clasp entrance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is in the same direction as our keep? Because we have a crippled guy on our shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we wanted to get the family and Gilmore back to the keep first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the kids. Get them back to the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't you tree-shoot us, tree-shoot them there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to use that in case we need to tree-shoot us to Vasselheim. Or somewhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's hold that off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to the Clasp entrance, right, to go to the tunnels and all the network of shit that we don't understand because they'll be allies and the people that are going to stealth ahead are going to go to the well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we should bring three children into the Clasp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was my thought, is we take everybody who's down here, we get them back to the castle. In the meantime--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which castle? The keep?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep. In the meantime, you get the treasure. Once the treasure is gotten and they're back in the keep, we get together and find the Clasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perfect plan! Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Vax's hand and pull him back as they pace away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as you guys all find your way outside of the remnants of Gilmore's facility, the three children and Salda staying very close. She keeps the children like right at her sides with her arms around them, protectively. Sherri's at her side as well with her blade out just in case, and they're forming this circle around the remnants of the Tal'Dorei family. As those of you continue to push forward, before you disappear, Keyleth grabs and pulls you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Splitting off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Don't, wait! Vax, Vax, listen to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull away and go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Vax! God fuckin', you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Vax quite literally disappears from your sight after a few steps, vanishing into the shadow of the rubble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go through to my earring. Vax, talk her out of it. This is not the time to be looting for treasure. That's only ever brought us grief. Talk her out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 29, 39 on stealth for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's taking the kids home?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's going with you guys, by the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're coming with us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going, yeah, with the kids.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With the kids? I'll cast Pass Without a Trace on us. On team back-to-the-keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll have you guys roll a stealth check as well. Okay. And you're heading with them to the--

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: So, well. In what direction is the keep, because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The keep is southward. It's away from the entrance to the Clasp.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Garthok's dilemma is his first priority is trying to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do what you got to do, Garthok.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Garthok's dilemma is his--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't tell us, just do it!

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: He's got to go towards the Clasp because he's trying to make sure they're still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys divide, Garthok still stands there for a second looking back and forth, conflicted by this. Vex, you pick up on this as you're walking away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What're you doing?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I have to go, I have to find the Clasp. It's my number one priority. It's why I sought you guys out in the first place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We understand. We've got the kids.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I'll meet you at the Clasp entrance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do you want us to meet you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you tell us where the entrance is? Do we know where the entrance is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which entrance?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: The entrance that I know exists is in the same direction as the treasure, so I will travel with you until we get to the entrance, which hopefully is there and not destroyed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Better fucking stealth like a motherfucker.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Ready. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus ten. 24 for stealth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we all rolling stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Everyone is. Plus ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yup. I rolled a 16.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, 26 stealth, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was at disadvantage, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Well-played.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you guys split off in the rain, occasionally you hear the slam of something heavy echoing in the distance from the Cloudtop and a guttural yell of frustration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping my eye out for any kind of anything in front of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You're not sure what or why anything's happening, but twice during your journey northward for this, you hear a low growl or roar and there's a flash of fire from over the wall. You don't know what happened. As you guys push, darting through the alleys, for the team that's going for the entrance to the Clasp, you lead them into--

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: A trap! Booyah! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would've been amazing.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I've been waiting to trap you for three hours!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very dark. There's almost no light down there other than what's pouring in through this entrance. It looks like most of the wine bottles here have been taken out. It's empty other than a few small bottles that are set up in this vast criss-cross of wooden racks, and you go ahead and walk over to one of the barrels and lift up the top of a heavy, heavy whiskey barrel. Pulling off the top of the barrel, the barrel itself does not move as he's wrestling with it. As he does, he climbs into and stops for a second, looks around, and shows you guys that this barrel itself is actually a chute ladder that leads downward into a subterranean base.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it. Now is all that shit up top going to be open for us when we come back?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I could wait for you here or maybe come with you and get some of that treasure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be a while, you know. We've got to get the treasure and go back to the Keep and come back--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can come with us. You can come with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's up to you. I know you need to talk to the Clasp, so if you need to talk to them and let them know we're on our way--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Enough treasure to go around.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I could definitely let them know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I'm relieved that it's there and not destroyed, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, you guys, now knowing where the entrance is, you make your way back out. You close the cellar and make your way towards where this dwarf's general description of the well is. I want you to make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not with us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I thought he said everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, everybody in that group. But congratulations!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I escort the kids expertly. I'm a champ at babysitting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've had a Percy game today. You've had a lot of twenties.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you dart off for a second, seeing a similar crossroads between alleys, and you find a well that very much appears to be, and you know it's yours because there's a number of copper and gold coins that are scattered around the base of the well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is it. Traps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look around. Can I perceive anything or any people around, anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You-- damn, guys. You glance about and nobody is here. Other than the sound of the rain that is still smashing down from outside, there doesn't appear to be any individual within visual range right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex, can you scan for dragons, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 22 for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Empty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He got it already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dicks! Dicks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Talking about dragons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, whoever the fuck came and took all the fucking gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dragons came and got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take one of the shovels and move some of the dirt to see if maybe it's deeper than it looks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go ahead and move some of the dirt, and you find a couple more coins, a total of 35 gold it would be, really, that you get from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a waste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we see, can I see any signs of dragon claws or dragon slobber or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) There are none around you, and you gather from the sheer immensity that is the Cinder King that if he were to come down here and retrieve this gold himself, most of the adjacent buildings and the well would be ruined.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So people put a bunch of gold there then someone else came and took it?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Well, allegedly a bunch of gold. Maybe that's all they found.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's your fucking people from the Clasp, isn't it?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use tracking to see if it looks like anybody's been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a wisdom survival check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. There are a number of footprints, actually. Relatively recent, that all--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that 17 or 11? That's 11. Okay, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay. So looking about, you see the tracks pushing northward. There's about four fresh sets of prints, fresher than the others you see around it. The trail of coins that follow that for about ten, 15 feet, you can tell that they were taken in haste. You gather by the way it's set up that perhaps somebody else had found this cache before you did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I never thought, when we came back up out of the fucking trap door, were the people still unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they were still unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's follow the tracks. They're fresh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we really going to scrabble about in the mud for coin today?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we've come this far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: What a great leader.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should go back to the Keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right, you're right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a waste of our time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd be open to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it could help us a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I understand, and it was not a bad idea, but this place has been cleared out, let's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But what if it's just one or two people that came and stole everything and we could totally take them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And they're like 100 yards away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they're like right up the alley. Like right there. Can I stealth ahead a little bit and see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You stealth ahead, and at this point, you follow the tracks that go to the road, and they're following the alleys as well, you can see from the way they're--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait wait wait. I'm sorry, one second. You know, you're very charming, but you're a fucking weirdo. And I climb up after my sister stealthily and follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and what do you two do?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I'm going back to my trap door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So Garthok, you step away from the group and head back to the Clasp.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Thank you for--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been a great day killing with you. I hope our paths cross again, perhaps in the catacombs.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I will let the Clasp know that you're coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They stealthed, so I don't know where they went, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a natural 20 on my stealth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got a nine on perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no clue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I look at the tracks? I can't read tracks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom survival check, just for the hell of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you're with everyone else bringing the rest of them back to the keep. You're with the other half of the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're with me, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're babysitting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are babysitting the family and Gilmore, getting him back to the keep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Wait, why did I stealth check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To stealth with them to get out of the city, and we'll get to you guys in just a minute.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I thought I was going with them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I even know how to get home from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on that check? You get really discombobulated in the center of the rainy midday of Emon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I said I was going to be right back, Scanlan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A hand shoots out of the darkness and grabs Scanlan by the nose and tugs him off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. You guys continue on, and following the tracks a little bit, they lead westward and curve down a few more alleys, heading towards the north entrance to the Cloudtop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, shit. Fuck it. They're taking it to the fucking dragon. Dicks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you continue to follow or do you head back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we'll fucking go back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you tell me how to get back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you say that again with your nose pinched?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will you tell me how to get back? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll get back. What happened to-- where's Gorthok?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Garthok.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Garthok. Where is he?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Garthok told me he was going back to his Clasp entrance. Our paths will cross again. He also said that you were kind of weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well. I am. I start walking back to the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys make your way back. The rest of you make your way further south, retracing the path you took here since you already know what's there. You do reach a certain point where as you push down one of the alleys, a few individuals come out, blades at the ready and, "Hey! Drop your "stuff. Give us what you've go--" And then, at which--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boof!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) At which point, Keyleth socks one in the jaw as Sherri pulls out a wand and blasts one of the nearby pieces of stone off the wall with a bolt of lightning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore, who steps onto his feet and carries his weight for a second raises his hands up, and as he does you can see arcane bolts whipping around him in this almost molecule-like electron pattern as he goes, "Do you gentlemen seriously wish to start this ruckus?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all go, "No." And they slowly back away and then dart around the corner as fast as they can. You hear their feet spattering against the mud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth goes, yeah, you better run!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Way to tell them, Kiki.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Gilmore lowers his hands, he begins to fall forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we grab him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all I've got. Take me home. Please."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're almost home. Almost home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pinches your cheek, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue to the path. As you make your way through the groups of the dead that you passed before, a lot of them have since been taken off the street and you can see now graves are being dug right outside of the gate as you find the south gate. Do you want to walk through the fields or do you want to use the same path you took into the secret path into the Keep?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think the fields would be my vote.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's too much going on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Out of the city is I think the safest way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why wouldn't we take the secret passage? It's here, right? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you say secret passage, Gren, the little boy, is like, "Did you say secret passage?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did! I did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes up and like, "I've never seen a secret passage before."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to go see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can we see the secret passage?" The kids seem really excited and you can see Salda, for the first time since you've seen her, smiles a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't disappoint the children.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) Fine. Secret passage it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's with you guys, don't forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's been keeping guard through the mud behind you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let the kids ride Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've been working around the clock to make sure that everyone who's currently held within the keep is being cared for and fed, and their faces immediately light up as you all start pouring out of the pantry. "I'm so glad to see all of you. I wasn't sure if you'd come back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we there now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're getting there first, before the rest of you. And she runs up and embraces each of you, wipes her brow. "I'll have food soon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she goes over and sees. "And the children, you got children with you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know whose they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The kids get really shy, seem quiet and hide behind Salda. She goes, "It's all right. We'll "take them-- where should we take them? Where should we go? Lead on, I've never been here before."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can put them in my room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, or mine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we'll put them up. I can sleep in my workshop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we've pulled a lot of our beds down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, most of the beds, most of your rooms are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll find a place for you. Just get comfortable for right now. It's a little cramped, I'm sorry. It's not Castletop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tomorrow." He hangs his head. You make your way into the rest of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I find a bed. Where's the nearest bed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The nearest bed would be one of the beds that you guys moved into Sarenrae's temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there someone on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's someone sitting on it, but as soon as you bring someone who looks as wrecked as he is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, hey, beat it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They get up and leave and you lay Gilmore down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "But my elbow really hurts!" (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After a short time of getting them established with Greyskull Keep, the rest of Vox Machina arrives, the rain now pouring heavily outside. Looking back, you can see some of the smoke has lessened. It's helping put out some of the fires in the remaining piles of burning wood that were once buildings of Emon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth runs up to Vax and gives him a hug. You're okay, you're okay? You did it? You talked her out of it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, Keyleth. He talked me out of it. I walk past.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. And I walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys get everyone situated in the Keep, your mind begins to turn to what the next step is in preparing for whatever the next step you want to be. And we'll go ahead and finish tonight's game at that point. Pick this up again next week, so we can go ahead and take a moment here to prepare for Critmas. I know some of you guys have got to run, so if you've got to run, say goodbye to the folks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you guys are all so wonderful and we love you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And get those to them, so we will be surprised for them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay, Garthok!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Garthok! Party on, Garthok!

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: So, also, tomorrow night, on this very channel at 7PM Pacific, 10PM Eastern, I am playing an acoustic concert. Right here, same channel, just one click away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In character or as Jason?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: As Jason. Maybe I'll try to write a Garthok song before tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome. Yeah, great! Yeah, guys, come back tomorrow, 7PM on this channel and go and watch Jason's awesome acoustic concert. He's a phenomenal musician. If you haven't seen his stuff, look it up beforehand just so you can get yourself prepped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can watch a bunch of music videos, too, and maybe see some of us.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: I think most of the people here have had cameos in my videos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's true, actually. So, there's that. And, actually, Mark Holmes, who's the dungeon master for the Yogscast RPG show that just started who are friends of ours, he makes a small cameo in one of the videos as well when he was in America briefly, so it all ties together. Yeah, he was there for that shoot. He's in the background with me in one of the shots. Yeah, just look for his nerdy British self. It's great. Love you, Mark. But yeah, Jason, thank you again for playing. Check out Jason tomorrow. Check him out in the Dungeons and Dragons-- what's the game title?

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Oh, I'm in Neverwinter. As Drizzt Do'urden--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's the character that everybody between 1986 and 1995 tried to make.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're also one of the dudes in Avatar, when they--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's been in Avatar a few times.

lines.name: JASON
lines.text: Avatar: The Last Airbender, World of Warcraft, a guy in Super Street Fighter--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to prep for Critmas, so yeah. See you soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [end of transcript]
